body.title: 2. Generating Test Cases
body.subtitle: Getting off the Happy Path
body.text: When generating test cases, we want to be sure to cover the intended business work flows, but we also want to test the edge cases.

sections.title: 2.1. Understanding the API
sections.text: One way to understand the API is to read the source code. The Versionary API is written in Go, so you'll need to be familiar with the language.

sections.title: 2.2. Generate Sample Data
sections.text: To test the API, you'll need sample data that exercises a range of possibilities. This requires an understanding of the data model.

sections.title: 2.3. Generate Test Cases
sections.text: Once you have sample data, you can generate test cases. This requires an understanding of the business work flows.
